comments.content: Wasn't able to identify a perfect match for this one. Almost all [College](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424141035/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Acollege)/ [Athletic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424141035/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Aathletic)/ [Varsity](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424141035/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Avarsity/)/ [Octagonal](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424141035/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Aoctagonal/fonts/) slab don't have such a crossbar serifed /E. Some I like: [United Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424141035/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/unitedcollection), [Player](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424141035/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/player), [Octin Sports](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424141035/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/octin-sports)
Very late but finally got it! Should be [College Boy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424141035/http:/www.dafont.com/college-boy.font) by Mickey Rossi.

Wow Ryuk!  
thanks for your highest loyalty!  
You are a man of your words!  
Great Respect! :)
